personal.name: José Sánchez
personal.title: Cloud Customer Engineer - SMB
personal.description: Cloud Customer Engineer for the SMB segment, specializing in Google Cloud solutions. I help small and medium-sized businesses leverage cloud technology to achieve their goals, providing technical guidance, architectural design, and strategic planning.

experience.title: Cloud Customer Engineer - SMB Segment
experience.description: Empowering small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) to thrive with Google Cloud solutions. I provide expert technical guidance, architectural design, and strategic planning to help clients leverage cloud technology effectively and achieve their business objectives. I provide expert technical guidance and strategic planning to SMB clients, ensuring successful adoption and utilization of Google Cloud services, design and implement scalable cloud architectures tailored to the unique needs of SMBs, optimizing for performance, cost, and security, collaborate with sales and product teams to develop and deliver compelling technical presentations and demonstrations for prospective clients, and act as a trusted advisor to SMB customers, addressing their technical challenges and guiding them through their cloud transformation journey.

experience.title: Technical Solutions Engineer - AI/ML (Previous Role)
experience.description: Provided advanced support to Google Cloud Premium Customers, developed expertise in GCP AI/ML solutions, collaborated on internal playbooks, and acted as a subject matter expert. I provided advanced support to Google Cloud Premium Customers, closing 89 cases and collaborating on 621 over the last year, ensuring timely resolution and customer satisfaction. I developed expertise in GCP AI/ML solutions (Vertex Al, Dialogflow, Speech Models) to effectively advocate for customer needs and resolve complex technical challenges. This expertise also led to collaborating on internal playbooks and tooling to improve supportability. I acted as a subject matter expert, delivering 331 consults to vendor TSRs, enabling efficient issue resolution and reducing product team toil by preventing bug creation.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and designed new applications using C# and Java, maintained existing applications, and improved internal documentation. I developed and designed new applications using C# and Java to meet agreed specifications, maintained existing applications and processes to improve the quality, reliability, and performance of the application as well as suggest recommendations for improvements, and improved and updated internal documentation for software development, custom software tools, and system security.

experience.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
experience.description: Improved test case documentation time, defined and documented test cases, and analyzed end-user requirements. I improved the test case documentation time from one day to one hour by creating a web application to design and upload test cases in the test case management system, defined and documented test cases to fulfill system requirements and maintain the product knowledge base, and analyzed and tested end-user requirements resulting in finding bugs and proposing possible improvements.

projects.title: Cinema Gear Hub
projects.description: A user-friendly cinema gear rental platform built with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring Stripe integration and Firebase backend.
projects.imageAlt: Image of Cinema Gear Hub project

projects.title: Web Application for students
projects.description: A web app developed for students to plan schedules and track shuttle in real-time using Vue.js, Vuetify, and Firebase.
projects.imageAlt: Image of student web application project

certifications.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
